description: Try our easy to follow Grapes Marinated In Port recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grapes Marinated In Port Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: .25 cup vanilla ice cream, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Prick the grapes with a knife, then place them in a large shallow serving dish and drizzle with port. Leave to marinate in the refrigerator for several hours or overnight.
To serve, bring to room temperature, then spoon into glass dishes and top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
